name: PHAssetResourceRequestOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the delivery of underlying asset data that you request from the asset resource manager.

items.name: var isNetworkAccessAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested asset resource data from iCloud.

items.name: var progressHandler: PHAssetResourceProgressHandler?
items.desc: A block that Photos calls periodically while downloading the asset resource data.

items.name: typealias PHAssetResourceProgressHandler
items.desc: The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset resource data from iCloud. Used by the progressHandler property.
